short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly access your own saved result - Query & Answer System

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "StackForGeeks" is a Chrome extension that helps you save important information you copy from any website. When you save something, you can add a search term to it. Later, when you search using that term, the extension will show you what you saved before. It's like a personal note-taking tool that helps you quickly find answers based on what you've copied in the past.
